schema.description: Private details about a user.

country.description: The country of a user. Will generally show as a flag next to the user's display name.

kind.description: The kind of a user. Either a regular user or a bot.

updated_at.description: A `Date` with time, as described in [RFC 3339, section 5.6](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6).

location.description: A user's location. It's not formatted nor checked as an existing place, so it could be anything.

get.description: Returns the list of all users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: A pagination page number.

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: The number of paginated items per page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: The number of paginated items per page.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The results order. If not set, results won't be ordered.

schema.description:
The order of the users in an array:
  * `last_joined`: From the latest created review to the oldest one
  * `first_joined`: From the first created review to the latest one
A paginated array of users.

items.description: An array of users (without unnecessary details).
Public informations about a user (only required ones).

country.description: The country of a user. Will generally show as a flag next to the user's display name.

kind.description: The kind of a user. Either a regular user or a bot.

updated_at.description: A `Date` with time, as described in [RFC 3339, section 5.6](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6).

per.description: The number of paginated items per page.

total.description: The total count of elements in a paginated result. It represents the total in all pages, and **does not** depend on the number of items per page.

get.description: Lists all published placemarks by default. If a `state` query parameter is set, this endpoint will list all placemarks in the specified state.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: A pagination page number.

parameters.name: per
parameters.description: The number of paginated items per page. For example, if you paginate 1 to 42 per 10 and ask for the third page, you will get 31 to 40.

schema.description: The number of paginated items per page.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A state to filter placemarks. Default is 'published'.

schema.description: The state in which a placemark is.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The results order. If not set, results won't be ordered.

schema.description:
The order of the placemarks in an array:
  * `last_created`: From the latest created placemark to the oldest one
  * `first_created`: From the first created placemark to the latest one
  * `last_published`: From the latest published placemark to the first one
  * `first_published`: From the first published placemark to the last one
**Note:** Creation date and publication date are very different: One could have created a placemark a while ago but published it just recently.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The desired locale for response localization.

schema.description: A locale, as described in [Language and Locale IDs](https://tinyurl.com/apple-language-and-locale-ids).

per.description: The number of paginated items per page.

total.description: The total count of elements in a paginated result. It represents the total in all pages, and **does not** depend on the number of items per page.

PlacemarksOrder.description:
The order of the placemarks in an array:
  * `last_created`: From the latest created placemark to the oldest one
  * `first_created`: From the first created placemark to the latest one
  * `last_published`: From the latest published placemark to the first one
  * `first_published`: From the first published placemark to the last one
**Note:** Creation date and publication date are very different: One could have created a placemark a while ago but published it just recently.

PlacemarkSubmissionReviewsOrder.description:
The order of the placemark submission reviews in an array:
  * `last_created`: From the latest created review to the oldest one
  * `first_created`: From the first created review to the latest one
